A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: All the hype to continue the Skywalker family saga was ruined with this movie. No real answers were revealed to anything from The Force Awakens. I waited 2 years for a 2.5hr film about 2 ships following each other. Rey receives no real Jedi training from Luke. No answers or screen time about the rise of Snoke or where he came from. Kylo defeats Snoke with a cheap parlour trick. Luke dies from ???? A brain aneurysm??? Very disappointing.
